attributes.action: Compulsory 'Government TAX only Share' in every company which is based in or operates in the UK.
attributes.additional_details: We the undersigned call the Government to stop TAX avoidance by making it compulsory that the Government hold a share, for TAX purposes only, in every company that operates in or is resident in the UK.  The holding of this 'Government' share will ensure that all company information including real accounts and details of dividend payments are made available for TAX accounting purposes.
